00013     void G4CalorimeterHit::Draw() {
00014 
00015         G4VVisManager* visManager = G4VVisManager::GetConcreteInstance();
00016 
00017         if (visManager) {
00018             G4Point3D p3D = G4Point3D(position_);
00019             G4Circle chit(p3D);
00020             chit.SetScreenDiameter(3.0);
00021             chit.SetFillStyle(G4Circle::filled);
00022 
00023             G4Colour col(1.0, 0.0, 1.0);
00024 
00025             chit.SetVisAttributes(G4VisAttributes(col));
00026             visManager->Draw(chit);
00027         }
00028     }
